run

public void run(Density density,
                Parameters1 p1,
                boolean verbose,
                java.io.PrintWriter pointWriter,
                java.io.PrintWriter forceWriter)
Runs the 1-cell. If the cell converges, the density value is then calculated and boolean converged is set to true.

Parameters:
density - density estimator
p1 - trial parameters
verbose - if true, prints trial to screen
pointWriter - writes the point locations
forceWriter - writes the forces
